series.title: Parade's End
series.description: Ford Madox Ford's acclaimed tetralogy juxtaposes the lives of Christopher Tietjens, an old-fashioned man of good birth whose life is torn apart by World War I; his wife, Sylvia, a cunning woman whose ruthless personality masks a complex reaction to the limitations of being a wife in the era; and their friends, lovers, associates, and enemies. The series is noted for being told in a non-linear, stream-of-consciousness style.

series.title: The Fifth Queen
series.description: This trilogy is often published as a single long novel.
